MainWindowGUI module

class MainWindowGUI.Ui_PrismsMainWindow[source]

Bases: object

Ui_PrismsMainWindow Class is the main PyQt6 class that contains all the functions and UI elements relevant to the Main GUI for the PRISMS II Application.

closeEvent(event)[source]

This function is called when the program is terminated. The Thread is automatically stopped and killed. :param event: event

downClick()[source]

This is the function used when the Down button is clicked. It sends data to either the relative motion function or the absolute motion function, based on whether the text field is empty or not.

filterPopupFalse(message)[source]

This is the popup for the filter wheel if the COM port check fails. :param message: string

filterWheelCheck()[source]

This is a COM Port check for the filter wheel.

homeAction()[source]

Calls all the home functions for Zaber motion and Filter Wheel.

leftClick()[source]

This is the function used when the Left button is clicked. It sends data to either the relative motion function or the absolute motion function, based on whether the text field is empty or not.

logSend(msg)[source]

This is the function that passes the log message to the plain text field. :param msg: string

resetFilterAction()[source]

Resets the Filter Wheel to its default position

resetZaberMotion()[source]

Resets Zaber Motion device to its default position.

retranslateUi(PrismsMainWindow)[source]

This function re-translates the UI to form unique names for each UI element. :param PrismsMainWindow: object

rightClick()[source]

This is the function used when the Right button is clicked. It sends data to either the relative motion function or the absolute motion function, based on whether the text field is empty or not.

savePicture()[source]

Function that saves the last image from the camera. This function saves the image as a binary file with a timestamp in the form DD/MM/YY-HH/MM/SS

savePictureAction()[source]

This function is used to enable the save picture action by stopping the video.

setFilterAction()[source]

Sets filter wheel based on the selected option in dropdown

setupUi(PrismsMainWindow)[source]

Creates the GUI for the main window application by creating all UI elements :param PrismsMainWindow: object

startVideoAction()[source]

This function starts the video thread itself.

upClick()[source]

This is the function used when the Up button is clicked. It sends data to either the relative motion function or the absolute motion function, based on whether the text field is empty or not.

update_image(data)[source]

Function used to constantly update the Video Feed :param data: object

zaberPopupFalse(message)[source]

Popup for Zaber Motion COM port check if it fails. :param message: string

zaberSerialCheck()[source]

COM port check for Zaber Motion.
